entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:29 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:29 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 10:29 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
